location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 6/11 Air photographs of Kuwait and Aerial Reconnaissance'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 1-15; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains permissions and correspondence pertaining to aerial photography of the territory of Kuwait.
